patterns: Hi
Hello
Hey
Is anyone there?
Good day
What's up?
responses: Hello! Welcome to our bicycle rental service. How can I assist you?
Hey there! Need help renting a bike?
Hi! How can I make your biking experience better?

patterns: Are there any bikes available?
Do you have bikes right now?
Can I rent a bike now?
Is a bicycle available for rent?
responses: Yes! We have bikes available. You can check real-time availability in the app.
Availability depends on your location. Open the app to see nearby bikes.
Yes, you can rent a bike now! Just select a bike from the app and start your ride.

patterns: How much does it cost to rent a bike?
What are your rental prices?
How much is bike rental?
What are the charges for renting a bicycle?
responses: Our rental prices start at $X per hour. Check the app for more details!
The cost depends on the rental duration. You can see pricing in the app.
Bike rental starts from $X. Let me know if you need more details.

patterns: How long can I rent a bike?
Is there a time limit on rentals?
Can I rent a bike for a full day?
What is the maximum rental period?
responses: You can rent a bike for as long as you need! We offer hourly and daily rentals.
Yes! You can rent for a short trip or an entire day. The app shows available durations.
There is no strict limit! Just check the app for rental options.

patterns: Where do I return the bike?
How do I end my rental?
Where can I drop off the bike?
Do I need to return the bike to the same place?
responses: You can return the bike at any designated drop-off location. Check the app for nearby stations!
Just park it at a bike station and lock it. The app will confirm your return.
You can return the bike to any available station. Need help? Let me know!

patterns: How do I pay for the rental?
What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with a credit card?
Do you accept online payments?
responses: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets. Pay securely via the app!
Yes, you can pay online using various payment methods.
Payments can be made directly in the app using your preferred method.

patterns: I have a problem with my bike
What if my bike breaks down?
How do I contact support?
I need help with my rental
responses: No worries! Contact our support team via the app or call our helpline.
If you have an issue, report it through the app, and we'll assist you.
Need help? Reach out to our 24/7 support for quick assistance.

Goodbye
See you later
Thanks
Thank you
